Hi Harry

Thanks for the answer. I got 1.6.0r2 but now it won't compile bec=
ause
somehow ext/cvode/include/nvector.h is not on the include path and the=

compilation of Cantera/src/CVodesIntegrator.h fails.

Any ideas?


Michael=

i group

> I'm trying to write a script which largely automates the
> dow=
nload/configureation/build/installation of Cantera on the institutes
> comp=
uters (some of the people here are not very fluent in installing
> things o=
n linux).
> 
> A problem I encountered is, that the configure script always=
 tries to
> build the F90 interface, no matter what value BUILD_F90_INTERFA=
CE has.
> I tracked it down into the config/configure script, where the BUI=
LD_F90
> variable is assigned correctly 0 or 1. But then, further on, the l=
atter
> variable is used in an if statement with test -n:
> 
> if test -n $=
{BUILD_F90}; then
> 
> which will always result in true. If I'm not mistake=
n, it should read
> 
> if [ $BUILD_F90 =3D 1 ]; then
> 
> 
> This concerns =
the source package of version 1.6.0.
> 
> 
> Michael
